title: Walter L¨¹bcke: Far-right suspects in court over politician's murder
title_page: Walter L¨¹bcke: Far-right suspects in court over politician's murder - BBC News
maintext: Ernst initially admitted to the murder but then retracted the confession, and said Markus H carried out the killing. However, while Markus H attended right-wing demonstrations with Ernst, prosecutors do not believe he knew of any solid plans to attack L¨¹bcke and do not think he was present at the scene of the crime.
